channel.title: Artificial Intelligence on PepsFeeder
channel.description: Recent content in Artificial Intelligence on PepsFeeder

item.title: A Small Army Combating a Flood of Deepfakes in India’s Election
item.description: The Indian government has deployed a small army of fact-checkers to combat a flood of deepfakes during the country’s general election, which began on Thursday.

item.title: 50 Mind-Blowing Implications of self-driving Cars
item.description: Uber just announced that it just ordered 24,000 self-driving Volvos. Tesla just released an electric, long-haul tractor-trailer with extraordinary technical specs (range, performance) and self-driving capabilities (UPS just preordered 125!

item.title: WISE Conference in Doha: Artificial Intelligence Will Change the Future of Education in the World
item.description: What form of education looks forward? Will artificial intelligence eliminate the role of teachers? Such questions and others were the subjects of the interventions of participants at the WISE 10th World Education Innovation Summit on Wednesday, entitled “Learn again, what does it mean to be a human being?
